mapper.sql: menu_id , menu_name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, query, is_frame, is_cache, menu_type, visible, status, perms, icon, create_time remark
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sm.* FROM sys_menu sm JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sm.menu_id = srm.menu_id JOIN sys_user_role sur ON srm.role_id = sur.role_id WHERE sur.user_id = #{userId} and sm.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY sm.parent_id, sm.order_num

SELECT m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.parent_id, m.order_num, m.path, m.component, m.query, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.menu_type, m.visible, m.status, m.perms, m.icon, m.create_time, m.update_time, m.remark, p.menu_name as parent_name FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON m.parent_id = p.menu_id WHERE m.menu_id = #{menuId} AND m.del_flag = '0'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_menu WHERE parent_id = #{menuId} AND del_flag = '0'

SELECT DISTINCT p.perms FROM sys_menu p LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rp ON p.menu_id = rp.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON ur.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND p.del_flag = '0' AND p.status = '0' AND p.menu_type = 'F'

SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE m.del_flag = '0' AND m.status = '0' AND m.perms IS NOT NULL AND m.perms != '' AND ur.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT DISTINCT rm.role_id FROM sys_role_menu rm LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = rm.role_id WHERE r.del_flag = '0' AND r.status = '0' AND rm.menu_id = #{menuId}
